import React from 'react' import AddCart from './AddCart' const productsArr = [{name:'Mouse',image:'1.jpeg',price:'100'},{name:'Keyboard',image:'2.jpeg',price:'400'}, {name:'Geometry',image:'3.png',price:'50'},{name:'School bag',image:'4.jpeg',price:'800'}] const HeaderFooter = () => { return ( <>
Shopping Cart
{productsArr}
) } export default HeaderFooter
